packageDescription: Explore the sunny beaches of Goa with vibrant nightlife, serene beaches, and adventure-filled activities.
packageAccommodation: Beachfront cottage with stunning sea views
packageMeals: Breakfast included, with additional meal packages available
packageActivities: Water sports, beach parties, and sunset cruises

packageDescription: Experience the tranquil backwaters of Kerala with houseboat stays and breathtaking views.
packageAccommodation: Houseboat stay with serene backwater views
packageMeals: All meals included, featuring traditional Kerala cuisine
packageActivities: Houseboat cruise, village tours, and birdwatching

packageDescription: Discover the royal heritage of Jaipur with its palaces, forts, and vibrant culture.
packageAccommodation: Stay at a heritage hotel with royal interiors
packageActivities: City palace tour, elephant ride at Amber Fort, and shopping in local markets

packageDescription: Enjoy the scenic beauty and adventure activities in the hills of Manali.
packageAccommodation: Luxury mountain lodge with panoramic views
packageActivities: Trekking, river rafting, and hot springs

packageDescription: Experience the romantic city of Udaipur with its stunning lakes and royal heritage.
packageAccommodation: Stay at a luxury hotel overlooking Lake Pichola
packageActivities: City palace tour, boat ride on Lake Pichola, and cultural evening

packageDescription: Explore the serene beaches and marine life of Andaman with scuba diving and island tours.

packageActivities: Scuba diving, island hopping, and water sports

packageDescription: Find peace and thrill in Rishikesh, known for its yoga retreats and white-water rafting.

packageDescription: Discover the majestic beauty of the Taj Mahal and other Mughal architectural wonders in Agra.

packageDescription: Explore the golden sands of Jaisalmer with a thrilling desert safari and stay in luxurious desert camps.

packageActivities: Camel safari, dune bashing, and cultural performances

packageDescription: Enjoy the scenic tea gardens of Darjeeling with views of the mighty Kanchenjunga.

packageDescription: Experience the spiritual essence of Varanasi, with its sacred temples and serene ghats.

packageDescription: Unwind in the beautiful hill station of Shimla, surrounded by lush forests and colonial charm.
packageAccommodation: Heritage hotel with mountain views

packageDescription: Relax in the French colonial town of Pondicherry with its pristine beaches and unique culture.

packageDescription: Marvel at the intricate carvings and rich history of the UNESCO World Heritage temples in Khajuraho.

packageDescription: Immerse yourself in the rich cultural history of Kolkata with visits to iconic landmarks and cultural experiences.
